name: crimson_vow_expanded
notes: Templates are paraphrased and generalized; no verbatim card text. Brackets indicate cleave-removable text for flavor.

Creature: Training. (When this attacks with a creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this.) When one or more counters are put on this, you gain {X} life.
ETB: create a 1/1 Human creature token for each Aura attached to creatures you control.
Other Humans you control get +1/+1.
ETB: tap up to {X} target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Whenever you gain life, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Flash. ETB: exile target attacking creature until this leaves the battlefield.
Flying. Disturb {MV}.

ETB: creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Disturb {MV}. You may cast this from your graveyard as an Aura;                 return it to the battlefield attached to target creature.                 If it would go to a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
Instant: Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} and gains lifelink until end of turn.
Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
Create two 1/1 Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Tap up to two target creatures. [They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.] (Cleave {MV}).
Sorcery: Return target creature card with mana value {MV} or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this leaves the battlefield.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever a creature you control with Training attacks, scry 1.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 1/1 Spirit with flying.
Artifact: ETB: choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
Create {X} Blood token(s). (Artifacts with '1, T, discard a card, sacrifice this: draw a card'.) Whenever you sacrifice a Blood, tap target creature an opponent controls.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.
Enchant creature. When this enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until this leaves the battlefield.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has 'T: Add one mana of any color.'
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. Equip {MV}.

Creature: Flying. Disturb {MV}.

Enchant creature. Enchanted creature has 'Whenever this deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.' Disturb {MV}. You may cast this from your graveyard as an Aura;                 return it to the battlefield attached to target creature.                 If it would go to a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
Exploit. (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.)                When it exploits a creature, counter target spell unless its controller pays {MV}.
Prowess. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, scry 1.
ETB: return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Whenever you sacrifice a Blood, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {MV}.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.
Look at the top three cards of your library. [you may put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.] (Cleave {MV}).
Sorcery: Draw two cards. Then discard a card.
Create a 2/2 blue Zombie creature token with decayed.
Mill {X} cards, then you may return a noncreature spell card from your graveyard to your hand.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 blue Spirit creature token with flying.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap up to one target creature an opponent controls.
Artifact: Create 1 Blood token(s). (Artifacts with '1, T, discard a card, sacrifice this: draw a card'.) Whenever you sacrifice a Blood, scry 2.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature has 'When this becomes tapped, draw a card, then discard a card.'
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {MV}. Equip {MV}.

Creature: Exploit. (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.)                When it exploits a creature, each opponent discards a card.
Exploit. (When this enters, you may sacrifice a creature.)                When it exploits a creature, destroy target creature.
Menace. Whenever you sacrifice a Blood, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Deathtouch. ETB: create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed.
Flying. When this dies, you may pay {MV}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped.
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Vampires you control get +1/+0.
Instant: Target creature gets -{X}/-{X} until end of turn. If it would die this turn, exile it instead.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 2 life.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. [Create a Blood token.] (Cleave {MV}).
Sorcery: Each opponent loses {X} life and you gain {X} life.
Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens with decayed.
Search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Enchantment: At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed.
Artifact: Create {X} Blood token(s). (Artifacts with '1, T, discard a card, sacrifice this: draw a card'.) Whenever you sacrifice a Blood, each opponent loses 1 life.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Vampire you control.

First strike. Other Vampires you control get +1/+0.
Whenever this attacks, create a Blood token.

ETB: it deals {X} damage to any target.

This spell deals 2 damage to any target. [and 2 damage to another target.] (Cleave {MV}).
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Create a Blood token.
Sorcery: Destroy target artifact. Create a Blood token.
Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. If you control a Vampire, create a Blood token.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Blood token.
Enchantment: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vampire you control gets +2/+0 and gains menace until end of turn.
Artifact: Create {X} Blood token(s). (Artifacts with '1, T, discard a card, sacrifice this: draw a card'.) Whenever you sacrifice a Blood, this deals 1 damage to any target.
T, discard a card: Draw a card.

Creature: Trample. Training.
When one or more +1/+1 counters are put on this, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this.
This gets +1/+1 and has trample as long as it's night. Daybound. (Day/Night: no spells -> night next turn; two or more -> day).
ETB: search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Instant: Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn. Create a Blood token.
Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 2 or less. [Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.] (Cleave {MV}).
Sorcery: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains trample until end of turn.
Create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
Artifact: ETB: create a 1/1 white Human creature token and a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
